About Me

Hi! Let me tell you about myself...

BIO

Hello! Let me introduce myself. My name is Brian and I am a web developer based in the San Gabriel Valley of Los Angeles California. I have a love for development and would love for you to check out some of my work. I am constantly trying to improve myself and learn new languages or changes in languages that I currently know. I have a long history of Graphic Design alongside web development. I hope you will enjoy what you see here on my site.

Mt Sierra College

Professor of Intro to Web Development

I have the good fortune of teaching students the beginning web development and design class which includes the coding languages of HTML and CSS. I love teaching and find that it only ser ves to strengthen my love for web coding and design.

CodeMetro

Graphic Designer & Web Developer

Managed all graphic facets of marketing. Designed a fresh re-brand for the company as well as a new website (codemetro.com & npaworks.com). Multiple job duties included website design and coding, tradeshow booth design plus collateral, advertising, html email campaigns, and brochures.

Bread Beard Creative

Owner, Web Developer, & Graphic Designer

Through good communication I was able to make complex projects come to life efficiently, while at the same time exceeding customer expectations. Juggled multiple projects simultaneously while meeting strict deadlines for projects ranging from print, web, and major motion pictures.
